title: Fix broken Careers navigation link on the main page

requirements.summary: Fix the Careers navigation link in the Header component so clicking it navigates to the /careers route in both desktop and mobile navigation
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking 'Careers' in the desktop navigation bar navigates the user to the /careers page.
Clicking 'Careers' in the mobile hamburger menu navigates the user to the /careers page.
The Careers link behavior is consistent with how the Resources link is implemented in the Header.
No other navigation links or page functionality are broken by this change.

file_operations.description: Inspect and fix the Careers navigation link click handler in both desktop and mobile menus. Compare with the Resources link implementation and ensure consistent router.navigate usage. Verify the navigation works correctly by testing the onClick handler for the Careers nav item matches the pattern used for Resources.
